title: Anya Taylor-Joy
summary: Anya-Josephine Marie Taylor-Joy (/ˈænjə/ ANN-yə;[2] born 16 April 1996) is an  actress and model.[lower-alpha 1][3][4] She has received several accolades, including a Golden Globe Award, a SAG Award, and a Critics' Choice Television Award, and nominations at the BAFTA Film Awards and the Primetime Emmy Awards. In 2021, Time magazine placed her on the Time 100 Next list.[5]
